titleStmt.title: Otes's petition to the kings most Excellent Majesty, and to the lords and others of His Majesties most hon[oura]ble Privy Council
titleStmt.author: Oates, Titus, 1649-1705.

notesStmt.note: On verso is "Otes's letter, for the Right Honourable Sir Leoline Jenkins, Knight, His Majesties principal secretary of state at Whitehall
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
